pages.text: $(mod)FTB Industrial Contraptions$() is a rather new tech mod, highly inspired by the likes of Industrial Craft.$(br2)It has basically everything you can expect from a tech mod, though it does not have pipes.
Additionally, it $(n)does not run on FE$(). It has its own power system: $(item)Zaps$() (⚡)!$(br2)Zaps can convert into FE (1⚡=4 FE) by Cables and Generators, but you cannot convert FE into Zaps.
